creator: milamber@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 28140
Improvements patch

Improvements on Aggregate Graph Listener (GUI & settings)

* New GUI for settings
* Dynamic graph size
* Allow to change fonts for title graph, legend
* Allow to change bar color (background and text values)
* Allow to draw or not bars outlines
* Allow to select only some samplers by a regexp filter (useful for cold graph)

Some screen-shots in attachments

Any comments are welcome before committing.

creator: milamber@apache.org
text:
Commit done.

Improvements on Aggregate Graph Listener (GUI & settings)

* New GUI for settings
* Dynamic graph size
* Allow to change fonts for title graph, legend
* Allow to change bar color (background and text values)
* Allow to draw or not bars outlines
* Allow to select only some samplers by a regexp filter (useful for cold graph)
* Allow to define Y axis maximum scale
